title: Balloon goes up
brief_description: During the reign of King Louis XVI, the Motgolfier brothers invented the hot air balloon. Pierre Olaf narrates an animated account of the balloon flight in which the first living creatures, a duck, a sheep, and a rooster, were sent aloft in Versailles, France. No other credits available.
